title: Best early Black Friday MacBook deals
content:
Macworld

Black Friday, the biggest shopping event of the year, will take place on Friday November 24, 2023. If are looking for a great deal on a new MacBook Pro or MacBook Air you have come to the right place as we will share the best deals below.

We check all the best resellers in the U.S. and the U.K. every month, so we always have our fingers on the pulse of the best deals you can and could get – which means we know exactly what the best MacBook deals are. We have already seen some great deals and we share them below so you can get an idea of what to expect around Black Friday 2023.

But you don’t have to wait until Black Friday: in this article, you will also find the best prices for MacBooks that are available right now. So if it’s a MacBook Air you are after you can jump to that section, or if you’re looking for a 14-inch MacBook Pro you’ll find specific deals in the section below.

We also have some shopping tips that should help you get the best deals available on Black Friday. If you would like to buy an iMac, Mac mini or Mac Studio check out our round-up of the Best Black Friday Mac deals for the best desktop discounts.

Our bargain hunters have hand-picked the best MacBook deals currently available as the Black Friday season approaches., read on to find ut how much you can save.

For more deals take a look at our Best MacBook Pro deals and latest MacBook Air deals round-ups.

Black Friday shopping tips

  • We tend to find that the best savings are on older models.
  • Check the generation of the model that is discounted to make sure you know exactly what you are buying and what it’s really worth.
  • We’ve seen resellers switch to selling refurbished or used when the stock of brand-new models run out, so check that the model discounted isn’t actually a used Mac and therefore not as good a deal as it might look.
  • That’s not to say you should avoid refurb models – you just need to make sure that you aren’t buying refurb without knowing.
  • Mac deals aren’t limited to Black Friday. We see good deals all year round, so don’t feel pressured into buying during Black Friday.

Best MacBook deals in Apple’s Black Friday sale

Apple holds its own Black Friday shopping event, but rather than offering discounts it just gives gift vouchers with certain products. In 2023 you could get the gift vouchers if you bought the following Macs. We expect something similar in 2023.

  • $100/£100 Apple Gift Card: Mac mini
  • $150/£150 Apple Gift Card: M1 MacBook Air, M2 MacBook Air, iMac 24-inch
  • $200/£200 Apple Gift Card: M2 MacBook Pro 13-inch
  • $250/£250 Apple Gift Card: MacBook Pro 14-inch, MacBook Pro 16-inch
